description.value: Your studies of the stars have taught you about the mysteries of the cosmos. You choose one of the following 4th-rank spells to add to your spell repertoire: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clairvoyance] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Read Omens]. At 12th level, choose one of the following 5th-rank spells to add to your spell repertoire: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mind Probe] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Scouting Eye]. At 14th level, choose one of the following 6th-rank spells to add to your spell repertoire: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Scrying] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Truesight]. You become an expert with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.
